items.text: full on off stump, flicked to long-on off the front foot
items.shortText: Chahal to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: good length on off stump, blocked solidly on the front foot
items.postText: Sohel: "Poor decision by umpire. Doubt should be on batsman favour, isn't it? " --- Don't think there was doubt after that 4x zoom.
items.shortText: Chahal to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: flipper is not picked up by Mashrafe. Struck on the pad as he goes on the back foot, but this is sliding down
items.shortText: Chahal to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: length on off stump, defended on the front foot
items.shortText: Chahal to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: tossed up wide outside off, steps out and drills it down to long-off
items.shortText: Chahal to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, backs away and exposes the stumps to incoming ball as he punches this to extra cover
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: clears deep midwicket with a lot of ease. What a shot. Googly lands full on leg stump, he clears the front leg and sends it a long way with the slog sweep
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mashrafe Mortaza, SIX runs

items.text: full on leg stump, defended back towards the bowler off the front foot
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: length ball turning away wide outside off, past the outside edge
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: googly again and we won't need replays for this done. Mashrafe has stepped out at a short of a length ball and is moving into the leg side with his attempted slog. It spins past the outside edge and he's a long way out
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mashrafe Mortaza, OUT

dismissal.text: Mashrafe Mortaza st †Dhoni b Kuldeep Yadav 7 (9b 0x4 1x6) SR: 77.77

items.text: googly, short of a length and in at off stump. Tapped back to the bowler off the back foot
items.postText:
Mahneel Musa: "@Varun, don't mean to whine but how on Earth was that clear after the 4x zoom? There were at least 3 replays after that zoom. TV umpire was clearly confused. Is there any such thing as benefit of doubt anymore?" --- I'd say the 4x zoom made it clear to the umpire that the toe wasn't behind the line. The curve of the boot was, but that was aerial, so obviously wouldn't count.

Sal Sar Sah: "Mushi, that aint needed. What have you done!"
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Nazmul Islam, no run

items.preText: smug: "Mortaza tend to bat very irresponsibly these days, last match and this. He should have ensured that BAN bat out this. "
items.text: short of a length on off stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
items.shortText: Chahal to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: length on leg stump, looks to flick but cops this on the pad
items.shortText: Chahal to Nazmul Islam, no run

items.text: tossed up on leg stump, driven to long-on
items.shortText: Chahal to Nazmul Islam, 1 run

items.text: floated up full outside off, drills a drive against the turn but it's straight to extra cover
items.shortText: Chahal to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
items.shortText: Chahal to Nazmul Islam, no run

items.text: short of a length and in at off stump, tapped into the covers off the back foot
items.shortText: Chahal to Nazmul Islam, no run

items.text: yorker on middle stump, looks to flick but this pings off his front pad in front of point
items.shortText: Bumrah to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: length on middle stump, defended to extra cover off the front foot
items.shortText: Bumrah to Nazmul Islam, no run

items.text: yorker on leg stump, looks to flick but this deflects into the square leg region off the foot
items.shortText: Bumrah to Nazmul Islam, 1 leg bye

items.preText: Tahsin: "If it was clear after 4x Zoom and then why didn't he give it out after the first zoom. He still saw many other angle and then looked at zoom 3 more times before deciding. Umpire was undecided and the benefit of doubt should've gone to the batsman. "
items.text: slower ball at a length just outside off, drops it into the gully region with soft hands
items.shortText: Bumrah to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: length ball going across off stump, a single at point via the inside edge onto pad
items.shortText: Bumrah to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: length on middle stump, defended towards mid-on off the front foot
items.shortText: Bumrah to Nazmul Islam, no run

items.text: yorker at off stump, jammed down to long-off
items.shortText: Kumar to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: shot. He'll get a double. Nice flow through the line at this length ball wide outside off, sweeper cleans up to his left
items.shortText: Kumar to Nazmul Islam, 2 runs
